pages.text: Xaenon Ingots represent the pinnacle of metallurgical achievement, surpassing even Netherite in durability and strength. These ingots are essential for crafting the most powerful tools and armor available.
pages.title: Xaenon: The Apex Alloy
Smelting Xaenon
pages.text: Xaenon Ingots can be obtained through smelting or blasting either $(l:contentcraft:xaenon/raw_xaenon)Raw Xaenon$() or $(l:contentcraft:xaenon/xaenon_ore)Xaenon Ore$() directly.
